body:
Php framework for Advertising company

The purpose of the framework is to reduce the labor intensity of the programmers in the Internet advertising company,
This framework is the framework of the MVC pattern knot plus plug-in mode
The framework has been integrated sina, renren, QQ open platform interface
Framework constantly continuously updated ...

@author chenyong

name: Adphp-framework
